Package view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    View
    View Interface - extends Task
    defines the following functions:
    start() - enable to use non runnable classes as if they were
    displaySolution - Gets a solution and shows it
    getUserAction - returns the action that was input by the user
    printErr - gets a String and prints it
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicWindow
    BasicWindow Class extends Observable and implements Runnable.
    ChooseDifficultyWindow
    abstract ChooseDifficultyWindow Class - extends observable and implements Runnable.
    GameCharacter
    GameCharacter Class defines a general form of game character by int x, int y position and an image.
    GameMenuBar
    GameMenuBar class extends MenuBar
    GameView
    GameView abstract class extends observable and implements View and Runnable
    MenuBar
    MenuBar Class defines the common menu that will serve every window that will desires it.
    MyConsoleView
    MyConsoleView Class Extends Observable and implements View
    Not relevant for GUI
    Point
    Point Class - simple class that contains 2 x,y ints which represent position of a point.
    Tile
    Tile Class extends Canvas
    WelcomeWindow
    WelcomeWindow Class extends BasicWindow -
    is the GUI window that welcomes the user.
